title: Boolean signal edge detection
name: LGF_CountBooleanEdges
description: This function evaluates an input signal for different states in a certain amount of time.

input.name: monitorTime
input.description: Time to monitor and count edges on `trigger` input

output.name: single
output.description: Single edge until monitoring time expires

output.name: double
output.description: Two edges in between the monitoring time

output.name: long
output.description: Just a single edge in the monitoring time, the `trigger` input stays TRUE after the edge appears

output.name: severalEdges
output.description: Numerous Edges occur within the monitoring time

output.name: noOfEdges
output.description: Number of edges in between the monitoring time frame
